message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is highly valued by many of our customers. Given its quality and unique features, I believe it would be beneficial for you. I am offering it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $95.
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget considerations. After reviewing your proposal, I am willing to consider a counteroffer of $105 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counteroffer at $100 for the product.
